summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Occidental Avenue, from Connection Street to Holgate Street; Atlantic Street, Massachusetts Street and Holgate Street, each from First Avenue South to Occidental Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5248 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
